entry.title: OP_VAULT: a new vault proposal
entry.summary: The conversation discusses various proposals and ideas related to the Bitcoin script, including the use of a recovery-path key signature, the implementation of OP_CTV, and the possibility of using taproot to hide all this under. The proposal for a partial revault is also discussed, with suggestions for changes such as allowing an optional third output that is a redeposit back to the identical OP_VAULT sPK, and the use of a TLUV-like construction to construct "unvault[X]". The conversation highlights the importance of tangible code artifacts in testing these proposals.
